title: Super-Thin Didot?
content:
This looks like some version of Didot but the hairline strokes are thinner than any Didot I can find. Is it a custom drawing?  
Thanks....

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315231815im_/http:/typophile.com/files/timko_4680.jpg)
author: BrooklynRob

comments.content:
I believe this is HFJ Didot:

[http://typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100004](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315231815/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100004 "http://typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100004")

I tried setting it in HFJ Didot 96 to compare, but the thin strokes seem too thick. Maybe it's just how it looks on my screen, because the design of the letters otherwise does look right.  
Thanks for your help.
